T02D1784a:224b-2: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir sems can
T02D1784a:224b-3: thams cad nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa ste re
T02D1784a:224b-5: nam mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin te /
T02D1784a:224b-6: so sor nges pa'i gnas med pas khyab byed kyi phyir ro /
T02D1784a:224b-7: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa /
T02D1784a:224b-8: ngo bo nyid med pa ni skyed pa yang ma yin te /
T02D1784a:224b-10: de bas na chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa /
T02D1784a:224b-11: ngo bo nyid med pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D1784a:224b-12: rnam par byang ba'i dpe bstan par bya ste /
T02D1784a:224b-13: byang chub kyi sems ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1784a:224b-14: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
T02D1784a:224b-15: shes ni ye shes kyi sku skyed par byed pa
T02D1784a:224b-16: ste / rim pa gnyis kyis skyes pa dang spro bar byed pa ste /
T02D1784a:224b-17: byang chub kyi sems de yang zhes pa ni de
T02D1784a:224b-18: kho na nyid de lus la sogs pa la mi
T02D1784a:224b-19: gnas pa ste / 'dus byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:224b-20: gang zhig lus la sogs pa la mi gnas pa
T02D1784a:224b-21: de ni rtag pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba dang
T02D1784a:224b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni 'od gsal ba dang /
T02D1784a:224b-24: ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i gnas ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1784a:224b-25: de bzhin du rmi lam la ni 'di ltar 'byung ba ma yin te /
T02D1784a:224b-26: bdag gis skyes bu la sna tshogs pa 'di ltar bstan to //
T02D1784a:224b-27: bdag gis rmi lam mthong bar bya'o zhes skyes bu la yang sems pa mi 'byung ste /
T02D1784a:224b-28: 'dod dan mi mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1784a:224b-29: mi 'dod na yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:224b-30: de bzhin du khams gsum pa'i bya ba ni dge ba'am mi dge ba ste /
T02D1784a:224b-31: rmi lam bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1784a:224b-32: sgyu ma mkhan gyi sprul pa'i skyes pa bskor ba
T02D1784a:224b-33: mthong ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad yin no
T02D1784a:224b-35: de bzhin du phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i phyags par
T02D1784a:224b-36: gyur pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1784a:224b-37: so so'i skyes bor gyur pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D1784a:224b-38: de / de rnams rmi lam la bdag med pa ni 'khrul pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1784a:225a-2: 'o na gal te de ltar yin na gang sbyin pa dang /
T02D1784a:225a-5: sgom pa gang yin pa dang /
T02D1784a:225a-7: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:225a-8: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02D1784a:225a-9: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:225a-10: 'dod pa po rnams kyis gang zhig 'dod par gyur pa gser la sogs pa /
T02D1784a:225a-11: de dag thams cad 'dod pa tsam gyis ster ba ste /
T02D1784a:225a-12: ngag gis ni ma yin no //
T02D1784a:225a-13: rin po che des sbyin pa'i nor la sogs pa
T02D1784a:225a-14: de sems la mi gnas pa ni 'dod pa'i skyes
T02D1784a:225a-15: pa'i yid la gnas pa ma yin te /
T02D1784a:225a-16: sngar 'dod na yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:225a-17: yid bzhin nor bu la gnas pa ma yin zhes pa ni /
T02D1784a:225a-18: don du ma gnyer na mi ster ba'i phyir te /
T02D1784a:225a-19: ba lang la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1784a:225a-20: 'o na kyang de ltar ma yin na yang rkyen
T02D1784a:225a-21: gyi dbang gis de lta bu'i 'bras bu 'byung bar
T02D1784a:225a-22: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du shes pa ni yid
T02D1784a:225a-23: bzhin gyi nor bu'i dpe tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784a:225a-24: pa thams cad 'gro ba thams cad la chos bstan
T02D1784a:225a-25: pa'i sgo nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1784a:225a-27: de rnams la yang rnam par rtog pa gang yang mi mnga' ste /
T02D1784a:225a-28: rnams par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1784a:225a-29: de rnams kyis kyang thob tu 'dzud pa ma yin te /
T02D1784a:225a-31: 'o na kyang glo bur ba'i dri ma sel ba'i phyir /
T02D1784a:225a-32: bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no //
T02D1784a:225a-33: de bas na thams cad sangs rgyas pa yin te /
T02D1784a:225a-34: rang bzhin la brtan nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang
T02D1784a:225a-35: so sor skyes bo dag don dam par byer med
T02D1784a:225a-36: pa'i phyir ro // chos thams cad ni sbyin ba
T02D1784a:225a-37: la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so
T02D1784a:225a-38: pa'i phyir ro // // dper na ngo bo nyid
T02D1784a:225a-39: med pa'i phyir gang gis sbyin pa dang gang la
T02D1784a:225a-40: pa'i phyir ro // // sbyin pa'o // 'on kyang
T02D1784a:225a-41: 'dus byas ba tsam la brten nas rgya skyegs kyi
T02D1784a:225a-42: khu bas gsher ba'i ras bal gyis bon las de
T02D1784a:225a-43: dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba kho na yin
T02D1784a:225a-44: pa'i phyir ro // // sbyin pa'o // no //
T02D1784a:225a-45: de bas na chos thams cad stong pa yin na
T02D1784a:225b-0: yang 'das ma thag @225b tu bshad pa'i rigs pas
T02D1784a:225b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams te /
T02D1784a:225b-3: de rnams kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1784a:225b-4: pa'i lam gyi dbye bas sems can thams cad sangs
T02D1784a:225b-5: rgyas nyid du thob par byed pa ste /
T02D1784a:225b-6: 'on kyang don dam par de rnams dngos po med do //
T02D1784a:225b-7: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi sangs
T02D1784a:225b-8: rgyas dag rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1784a:225b-9: la zhugs pas yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du sems
T02D1784a:225b-10: can thams cad la sogs bstan pa la sogs pa
T02D1784a:225b-12: skyes bu yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
T02D1784a:225b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1784a:225b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:225b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs te /
T02D1784a:225b-16: chos nyid rtogs pas dgyes shing spyan gdangs nas rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad zhus te /
T02D1784a:225b-17: kye bcom ldan 'das 'di ni ngo mtshar ba yin te /
T02D1784a:225b-18: gang zhig nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra ba chos thams cad ni sbyin pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784a:225b-19: phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:225b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa gang yin pa de rnams /
T02D1784a:225b-21: rjes su 'brang ba ni de dang 'dra ba dang
T02D1784a:225b-22: de'i bdag nyid dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa dang ldan
T02D1784a:225b-23: par gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo
T02D1784a:225b-24: cag gis rtogs pa yin te /
T02D1784a:225b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:225b-27: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni byams pa la
T02D1784a:225b-28: sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D1784a:225b-29: po'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad zhus
T02D1784a:225b-30: so // sngags thams cad ni zhi ba dang drag po gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02D1784a:225b-31: de rnams kyis byas pa'i gang zhig dngos grub ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784a:225b-32: 'dus pa ni lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom ba ste /
T02D1784a:225b-33: de dag gang la gnas pa lags zhes 'dri ba'o //
T02D1784a:225b-35: re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kun gyi rang bzhin med pa nyid gsungs pa ste /
T02D1784a:225b-36: de bas na spros pa du ma'i dra ba dang
T02D1784a:226a-0: ldan pa'i dngos grub rnams cung zad kyang ma @226a
T02D1784a:226a-1: * // yin te the tshem ldang ba'o //
T02D1784a:226a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje
T02D1784a:226a-3: 'dzin gyis de rnams la 'di skad bka' stsal te
T02D1784a:226a-4: / de la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa ni the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:226a-5: sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub 'di rnams sku gsung
T02D1784a:226a-6: thugs ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas
T02D1784a:226a-7: bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sku la gnas pa ste
T02D1784a:226a-8: / de la brten nas de rnams 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:226a-9: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02D1784a:226a-10: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba dang //
T02D1784a:226a-11: dkyil 'khor la sogs rnam brtag pa //
T02D1784a:226a-12: gtor ma sbyin sreg bya ba kun //
T02D1784a:226a-13: rtag tu sgyu ma lta bur bya //
T02D1784a:226a-14: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02D1784a:226a-15: dbang dang mngon spyod de bzhin du //
T02D1784a:226a-16: gang zhig dgug pa la sogs kun //
T02D1784a:226a-17: de dag 'ja' tshon lta bur bya //
T02D1784a:226a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1784a:226a-19: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:226a-20: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T02D1784a:226a-21: dngos grub thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784a:226a-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:226a-23: de rnams bdag gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo
T02D1784a:226a-24: rje ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i rnam par gnas
T02D1784a:226a-25: pa ste ; sngar bshad pa'i rim pas so zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1784a:226a-26: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i rnam pa'i sku la
T02D1784a:226a-27: sogs pa de rnams kyang 'dod pa'i khams la sogs
T02D1784a:226a-28: pa la mi gnas pa ste /
T02D1784a:226a-29: bye brag med pas thams cad de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:226a-30: lus la sogs pa de rnams kyang phan tshun du
T02D1784a:226a-31: gzhi dang gzhi can gyi 'brel pas mi gnas pa
T02D1784a:226a-32: ste / sgyu ma lta bu nyid gcig yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1784a:226a-33: mar la mar bzhin du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te /
T02D1784a:226a-34: nam mkha' bzhin du rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes pa gtan tshigs so //
T02D1784a:226a-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis zhus pa ste /
T02D1784a:226a-36: kye bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar yin na /
T02D1784a:226a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis te /
T02D1784a:226a-38: de rnams gang du gnas pa ste /
T02D1784a:226b-0: gang gi drin gyis sgyu ma'i rgyu yongs su gzung ba ste dgongs @226b pa'o ;
T02D1784a:226b-1: / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1784a:226b-2: rang gi lus ngag sems ni sgyu ma lta bu'i
T02D1784a:226b-3: sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes tsam
T02D1784a:226b-5: de nyid la brten nas 'byung ba ni phyi rol du snang ba yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1784a:226b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
T02D1784a:226b-7: de lta bu'i ye shes tsam gyi sems de sgyu
T02D1784a:226b-8: ma'i sku'i rnam pa ste gang du gnas zhes 'dri
T02D1784a:226b-9: ba'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1784a:226b-10: nam mkha' la gnas pa ni 'od gsal ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D1784a:226b-11: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02D1784a:226b-12: bdag la byin rlabs ting 'dzin dang //
T02D1784a:226b-14: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis //
T02D1784a:226b-15: bden pa gnyis po de bshad pa'o //
T02D1784a:226b-16: bdag la byin rlabs go rims kyis //
T02D1784a:226b-18: de phyir rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02D1784a:226b-19: sngon du bdag la byin rlabs bstan //
T02D1784a:226b-22: nam mkha' ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1784a:226b-23: de yang gang du gnas zhes dri ba'o //
T02D1784a:226b-24: gang na yang mi gnas zhes pa ni lan te /
T02D1784a:226b-25: thams cad du gnas pa'o zhes ston to //
T02D1784a:226b-26: byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam 'grel las kyang /
T02D1784a:226b-27: ji ltar bu ram mngar ba dang //
T02D1784a:226b-28: me yi rang bzhin tsha ba ste //
T02D1784a:226b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1784a:226b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784a:226b-31: byams pa la sogs pa de rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni the tshom chod pa dang /
T02D1784a:226b-32: rmad du gyur pa ni chos kyi don rtogs pas so //
T02D1784a:226b-33: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi chos nyid
T02D1784a:226b-34: la gnas pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1784a:226b-35: bsgom pa ste / cang mi smra ba ni rnam
T02D1784a:226b-36: par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zad pas zhi
T02D1784a:226b-37: ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur pa ste /
T02D1784a:226b-38: sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02D1784a:226b-39: sems thams cad ni rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
T02D1784a:226b-40: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1784a:226b-41: de nyid kyi snying po ni blang bar bya ba ste /
T02D1784a:226b-42: de las rdo rje ni sgyu ma'i sku 'byung ba
T02D1784a:226b-43: le'u gang la yod pa de rjod par byed pa'i
T02D1784a:226b-44: gzhung gi tshogs kyang de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02D1784a:226b-45: rgyud 'grel las le'u bco lnga pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o//
T02D1784a:227a-0: @227a * // le'u bco lnga po'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni bzhi brgya drug cu'o /
T02D1784a:227a-2: // / le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1784a:227a-3: sku dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gnyis gtso bor gyur
T02D1784a:227a-4: pa le'u bcu drug pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1784a:227a-5: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1784a:227a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la'ang 'dus te /
T02D1784a:227a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
T02D1784a:227a-8: kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la
T02D1784a:227a-9: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i tshig ni /
T02D1784a:227a-10: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1784a:227a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1784a:227a-12: rnams kyis gsol ba btab cing de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1784a:227a-13: thams cad kyi ngo bo rin chen gyi mchod pa
T02D1784a:227a-14: ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa
T02D1784a:227a-15: rnams te ; de dag gi tshogs ni re re'i 'khor du ma rnams kyis mchod pa byas te /
T02D1784a:227a-16: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02D1784a:227a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:227a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:227a-19: de rnams kyis gang zhig rdo rje thams cad kyi
T02D1784a:227a-20: dkyil 'khor ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D1784a:227a-21: te / de dag gi seng ge ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rnams te /
T02D1784a:227a-22: de dag mchod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig ni
T02D1784a:227a-23: phyi dang gsang ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams
T02D1784a:227a-24: te / de dag nyid dag pa thob par byed pa'i phyir mdzes pas na rgyal po ste /
T02D1784a:227a-25: tshogs ni slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:227a-26: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la /
T02D1784a:227a-27: snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1784a:227a-28: de'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad ni rdo rje
T02D1784a:227a-29: 'chang chen po sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo
T02D1784a:227a-30: // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:227a-31: de nas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1784a:227a-33: sku'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil
T02D1784a:227a-34: 'khor rab tu bshad pa ni phul du byung bas
T02D1784a:227b-0: mchog ni me long lta bu'i @227b ye shes thob par byed pa'o //
T02D1784a:227b-1: de bzhin du thugs rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1784a:227b-2: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1784a:227b-3: yon tan dang gru bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan
T02D1784a:227b-4: dang 'dra ba'o // de nyid kyi phyir thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02D1784a:227b-5: de dag gi dkyil 'khor dag ste gang dang gang
T02D1784a:227b-6: de ru bdag po gnyis su gyur pa de dag
T02D1784a:227b-7: de'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes 'og nas gsungs pa'i
T02D1784a:227b-8: phyir ro // yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1784a:227b-9: khru ni bcu drug ces bya ba la sogs pa la phyogs bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:227b-10: rnam par snang mdzad ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin yin la /
T02D1784a:227b-11: gzugs kyang sa'i rang bzhin yin pa ste /
T02D1784a:227b-12: sa yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin
T02D1784a:227b-13: pas phyogs re re khams bzhi bzhi yin pa'i phyir
T02D1784a:227b-14: ro zhes rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1784a:227b-15: gru bzhi zhes pa ni phyi dang nang du'o //
T02D1784a:227b-16: rab tu mdzes pa ni dri ma med pa dang gsal ba'i tshon gyi ri mo dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1784a:227b-17: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams te /
T02D1784a:227b-18: de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni bzhir gyur pa'o //
T02D1784a:227b-19: sku rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1784a:227b-20: de nyid kyi dbus kyi gtso bo nyid du rab
T02D1784a:227b-21: tu gnas pa ni dbus su bzhugs par mdzad pa'o
T02D1784a:227b-22: // de'i nang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:227b-23: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus
T02D1784a:227b-24: su 'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i phreng ba bri ba
T02D1784a:227b-27: cho ga'i rdo rje zhes pa la /
T02D1784a:227b-28: cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ste /
T02D1784a:227b-29: de nyid rdo rje bzhin du brtan pa gang la
T02D1784a:227b-30: yod pa de ni sgrub pa'i blos bri bar bya'o
T02D1784a:227b-31: // 'dir ni cho ga'i sgra'i don yin te /
T02D1784a:227b-32: re zhig dang po rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1784a:227b-33: phyi yi rnam rtog ngan 'dra ba //
T02D1784a:227b-34: rnam par dben pa'i yid las spangs //
T02D1784a:227b-35: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur gyis //
T02D1784a:227b-36: gnang ba thob dang blo ldan pas ;
T02D1784a:227b-37: / zla ba nyi ma chu sman dang //
T02D1784a:227b-38: de bzhin dri yang sngags byas pa //
T02D1784a:227b-40: dam tshig gsang ba bsnyen par bya //
T02D1784a:227b-41: lan ni gnyis gsum slob dpon la //
T02D1784a:227b-42: gsol btab gsang ba'i bdud rtsi snod //
T02D1784a:227b-43: thar pa 'dod dang dad pa can //
T02D1784a:228a-0: @228a * // slob ma dam pa bltas nas ni //
T02D1784a:228a-1: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus tshul gyis //
T02D1784a:228a-2: 'di rnams bdag gis byang chub la //
T02D1784a:228a-3: gzhag par bya zhes rjes gzung ba //
T02D1784a:228a-4: de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis bsam //
T02D1784a:228a-5: de la re zhig dang po slob dpon ni theg pa chen po'i tshul la mkhas pa dang /
T02D1784a:228a-6: 'gro ba ma lus pa gdon pa la thugs rje dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1784a:228a-7: dad pa dang thos pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis
T02D1784a:228a-8: 'byung ba'i 'od gsal ba rtogs pas ma lus pa'i
T02D1784a:228a-9: yul nye bar spyod pa dri ma med par mdzad
T02D1784a:228a-10: pa dang / kun du 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D1784a:228a-11: so sor rtog pa'i bsam pas spyod pa rnam par
T02D1784a:228a-12: dag pa la gnas pa dang /
T02D1784a:228a-13: ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel pas dri ma dang bcas
T02D1784a:228a-14: pa'i bag chags dang gti mug gi rab rib yun
T02D1784a:228a-16: de lta bu'i slob dpon la gang gi tshe slob
T02D1784a:228a-17: mas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum
T02D1784a:228a-19: de'i tshe des kyang de la dri ba ste /
T02D1784a:228a-20: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad khyod kyis rdzogs sam ma rdzogs /
T02D1784a:228a-21: gal te cung zad rdzogs pa dang cung zad ma rdzogs so zhes zer na de'i tshe /
T02D1784a:228a-22: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i steng du khro bo'i
T02D1784a:228a-23: gzugs dang 'og tu rtse gcig pa'i rnam pa'i khro
T02D1784a:228a-24: bos de'i sems kyi bgegs rnams phur bus btab la
T02D1784a:228a-25: / de'i 'od zer gyi 'khor las kyang gdug pa
T02D1784a:228a-26: de rnams bsregs nas slob ma'i sems bsrung bar bya
T02D1784a:228a-27: ba'i phyir dbyangs tha ma las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1784a:228a-28: / bsams te / de'i steng du las kyi rdo rje yang bsam par bya'o //
T02D1784a:228a-29: bden pa ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D1784a:228a-30: bar brtags gang gis nus pa'o //
T02D1784a:228a-31: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1784a:228a-33: de bas na rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis dang
T02D1784a:228a-34: po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum
T02D1784a:228a-35: gyi mthar phra mo rdo rje bsgom pa dang /
T02D1784a:228a-36: rdo rje thig le bsgom pas sems brtan par byas
T02D1784a:228a-37: la dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi sngags re re 'bum
T02D1784a:228a-38: bzlas te / rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i lte
T02D1784a:228a-39: bar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pas nges par byas
T02D1784a:228b-0: bzlas te / la / de bzhin gshegs pa'i @228b
T02D1784a:228b-1: bka' sngon du 'gro ba rim pa 'dis dkyil 'khor
T02D1784a:228b-3: re zhig dang po aom bhu kham zhes bya ba'i
T02D1784a:228b-4: sngags kyis nam mkhar gyur pa'i sa gzhi h'um lam
T02D1784a:228b-5: h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis zla ba rdo rje'i
T02D1784a:228b-7: aom me de n'i badzri bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1784a:228b-8: sngar bshad pa'i bsam gtan gyis phur bus 'debs shing
T02D1784a:228b-9: yi ge hri:las byung ba'i nam mkha'i khams khyab par
T02D1784a:228b-10: byed pa'i chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'i nang du a'a
T02D1784a:228b-11: li dang k'a li las skyes pa'i sngar bshad pa'i
T02D1784a:228b-12: gnas pa rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi bsgoms la ;
T02D1784a:228b-13: de nyid lag pa g-yas pas reg cing yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1784a:228b-14: sa gzhi ji lta bu zhe na gru bzhi dang
T02D1784a:228b-15: sgo bzhi dang rdo rje'i ka bas rnam par brgyan
T02D1784a:228b-16: pa dang / phyogs bzhi la sgo dang rta babs dang /
T02D1784a:228b-17: rgyal mtshan dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa dmigs te /
T02D1784a:228b-18: lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams la gnas pa'i zla
T02D1784a:228b-19: ba dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams yi ge gsum gyis
T02D1784a:228b-20: byin gyis brlab par bsams la /
T02D1784a:228b-21: de'i dbus kyi gtso bo'i nga rgyal gyis phyi rol
T02D1784a:228b-22: gyi bud med rigs kyi dbye bas lha mo spyan
T02D1784a:228b-23: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de rigs kyi sa bon
T02D1784a:228b-24: lngas byin gyis brlabs shing de'i padmar yang yi ge
T02D1784a:228b-25: aa la sogs pa dgod cing snga ma bzhin du
T02D1784a:228b-26: dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams 'byung bar
T02D1784a:228b-27: bya'o // de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re lha mo bzhi dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1784a:228b-28: khro bo rnams kyang rang rang gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784a:228b-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang gzugs rdo rje ma
T02D1784a:228b-30: la sogs pa dang bcas pa spro ba dang bsdu
T02D1784a:228b-33: rjes su chags pas las la gnas par byas la /
T02D1784a:228b-34: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba brjod cing
T02D1784a:228b-35: bdag nyid dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha thams
T02D1784a:228b-36: cad kyi ngo bo rang bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o
T02D1784a:228b-37: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal byas
T02D1784a:228b-38: pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i slob ma rnams kyis rdo
T02D1784a:228b-39: rje dang dril bu lag na thogs shing bla ma
T02D1784a:228b-40: la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1784a:229a-0: @229a * // de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D1784a:229a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1784a:229a-2: chos mchog kun gyi bdag med pa //
T02D1784a:229a-3: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1784a:229a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba gdab par bya'o//
T02D1784a:229a-5: de'i 'og tu slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams la /
T02D1784a:229a-6: h'um badzro tishtha zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1784a:229a-7: 'khor lo bteg cing rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal
T02D1784a:229a-8: gyis yi ge ta dang ma dag las byung ba'i
T02D1784a:229a-9: mig gnyis ni zla ba dang nyi mar bsams te
T02D1784a:229a-10: / phyogs thams cad la yang de nyid las rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa bsams te /
T02D1784a:229a-11: rkang pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la /
T02D1784a:229a-12: nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i gar gyis dkyil 'khor gyis
T02D1784a:229a-13: gzhi la yi ge gsum brjod cing rdo rje sems
T02D1784a:229a-14: dpa'i nga rgyal gyis bcag par bya'o //
T02D1784a:229a-15: rdor sems yang dag sbyor ba yis //
T02D1784a:229a-16: mchu gnyis yang dag gzung byas te //
T02D1784a:229a-17: dpal ldan g-yon phyogs nga rgyal 'dzin //
T02D1784a:229a-18: phyogs kyi 'khor lo bcas par bya //
T02D1784a:229a-19: sa 'og sa bla sa steng rnams //
T02D1784a:229a-20: 'og dang steng ni bcings byas te //
T02D1784a:229a-21: gdug pa rnams kyis mi thub pas //
T02D1784a:229a-22: yi ge h'um ni brjod par bya //
T02D1784a:229a-23: de nas rdo rje rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1784a:229a-24: aom badzra mandal h'um dza:zhes bya bas bkug cing aom
T02D1784a:229a-25: ma h'a badzra tsa kra aa dhi tishtsha siddhi h'um
T02D1784a:229a-26: zhes bya bas dbyer med par byas la /
T02D1784a:229a-27: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya h'um phat ces
T02D1784a:229a-28: bya bas phur bus btab las gzhi de bdud rtsi
T02D1784a:229a-29: lnga'i chus byugs shing lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams
T02D1784a:229a-30: la tsandan dang bdud rtsi lnga'i chus thig le rnams
T02D1784a:229a-31: byas shing me tog gtor te /
T02D1784a:229a-32: lha'i dkyil 'khor dang rang gi gnas su zhugs par byas la /
T02D1784a:229a-33: gsang ba dang de las gzhan pa'i mchod pas mchod
T02D1784a:229a-34: cing gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs pa'i ngo
T02D1784a:229a-35: bo mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D1784a:229a-36: bum pa ha sa de ba dang /
T02D1784a:229a-37: ba hu pu kri ta dang pri ha ti dang /
T02D1784a:229a-38: dandotpa la dang aa pa r'a dzi ta zhes bya ba sman chen po dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1784a:229a-43: bye ru ste rin po che dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784a:229b-4: cung zad bdud rtsi lnga'i chu dang bcas pa rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis bzlas la /
T02D1784a:229b-5: 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus na bzhag nas spos gtul zhing mchod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:229b-6: las thams cad pa'i bum pa yang rang gi sngags
T02D1784a:229b-7: kyis byin gyis brlabs la shar phyogs kyi sgo'i phyi
T02D1784a:229b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la spos gtul bas zhu bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:229b-10: khyed rnams mchod par bya phyir dang //
T02D1784a:229b-11: slob ma rnams kyang rjes gzung phyir //
T02D1784a:229b-12: snying rje'i bdag nyid bdag de yis //
T02D1784a:229b-14: de phyir dang ldan bdag la ni //
T02D1784a:229b-15: bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad du gsol //
T02D1784a:229b-16: 'jig rten mgon po thugs rje can //
T02D1784a:229b-17: khyed rnams bdag la dngos su gsol //
T02D1784a:229b-18: dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1784a:229b-19: sngags kyi lha mo gzhan gang rnams //
T02D1784a:229b-20: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D1784a:229b-21: mthu chen gang zhig 'byung po rnams //
T02D1784a:229b-22: gang zhig lha yi spyan ldan pa //
T02D1784a:229b-23: bstan pa la dga' de rnams kun //
T02D1784a:229b-24: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pa yis //
T02D1784a:229b-26: ci nus pa yi nyer spyod pas //
T02D1784a:229b-27: nang par bri bar bya ba'o//
T02D1784a:229b-28: de phyir slob ma nang bcas pa //
T02D1784a:229b-29: bdag ni snying rjes bzung nas ni //
T02D1784a:229b-30: thams cad bcas pa dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1784a:229b-31: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D1784a:229b-32: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:229b-33: de'i 'og tu slob ma rnams bkug cing mo'i dkyil
T02D1784a:229b-34: 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge ra'i mes de rnams
T02D1784a:229b-35: re re thal bar byas la /
T02D1784a:229b-36: yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin rang gi kha nas zhugs te /
T02D1784a:229b-37: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo de nyid rdo rje nas spro bar byas la /
T02D1784a:229b-38: de nyid sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1784a:229b-39: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1784a:229b-40: dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i sgo'i ngos su bzhag nas 'di yis lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1784a:229b-41: sdig pa bdag gis gang byas pa //
T02D1784a:229b-42: byed du bcug dang rjes yi rang //
T02D1784a:229b-43: slar yang de nyid mi bya'i phyir //
T02D1784a:229b-44: de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02D1784a:229b-45: sangs rgyas mgon po'i bsod nams dang//
T02D1784a:230a-0: @230a * // rang rgyal slob ma las byung dang //
T02D1784a:230a-1: 'gro ba'i bsam pa las skyes gang //
T02D1784a:230a-2: thams cad bdag ni rjes yi rang //
T02D1784a:230a-3: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D1784a:230a-4: bla med chos ni rin po che //
T02D1784a:230a-5: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D1784a:230a-6: rin chen mchog gsum bla med pa //
T02D1784a:230a-7: sdom pa sangs rgyas sbyor skyed pa //
T02D1784a:230a-8: de ring bdag gis mchog tu gzung //
T02D1784a:230a-9: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D1784a:230a-10: bdag gis yang dag gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1784a:230a-11: slob dpon yang ni gzung bya ste //
T02D1784a:230a-12: rdo rje rin chen bsdus pa'o //
T02D1784a:230a-13: nyin dang mtshan du lan gsum du //
T02D1784a:230a-14: sbyin pa bzhi dag rab tu sbyin //
T02D1784a:230a-15: rin chen chen po'i rigs mchog la //
T02D1784a:230a-16: de ni dam tshig yid du 'ong //
T02D1784a:230a-17: phyi nang gsang ba theg gsum gyi //
T02D1784a:230a-18: dam pa'i chos ni blang bar bgyi //
T02D1784a:230a-19: byang chub chen po'i las byung ba'i //
T02D1784a:230a-20: padma chen po'i rigs dag pa'o //
T02D1784a:230a-21: sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02D1784a:230a-22: yang dag tu ni blang bar bgyi //
T02D1784a:230a-23: mchod pa'i las ni ci nus pas //
T02D1784a:230a-24: las kyi rigs chen bsdu ba'o //
T02D1784a:230a-25: tshul khrims gsum po'i rnam dag dang //
T02D1784a:230a-26: ting 'dzin de bzhin sdom pa rnams //
T02D1784a:230a-27: byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la //
T02D1784a:230a-29: sangs rgyas de yi sras rnams kyis //
T02D1784a:230a-30: shes rab chen pos ji bzhin bskyed //
T02D1784a:230a-31: byang chub sems ni che mchog go //
T02D1784a:230a-32: de bzhin bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1784a:230a-33: sangs rgyas dang ni de sras rnams //
T02D1784a:230a-34: mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1784a:230a-35: deng nas brtsams te ji srid du //
T02D1784a:230a-36: bla med byang chub thob kyi bar //
T02D1784a:230a-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D1784a:230a-38: sdom pa chos dag bsdu ba dang //
T02D1784a:230a-39: sems can don byed tshul khrims dang //
T02D1784a:230a-40: bdag gis brtan por blang bar bya //
T02D1784a:230a-41: dge ba 'di yis bdag gis ni //
T02D1784a:230a-42: sangs rgyas nyid du thob pa ste //
T02D1784a:230a-43: gting med srid pa'i rgya mtsho las//
T02D1784a:230a-44: 'gro ba thams cad bdag gis bsgral //
T02D1784a:230a-45: zhes bya ba lan gsum du bcug la /
T02D1784a:230a-46: de nyid kyi snying ga dang spyi bo dang lkog
T02D1784a:230a-47: ma rnams la rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma
T02D1784a:230a-48: bsams la / yi ge gsum brjod la reg cing
T02D1784a:230a-49: de'i lag pa la dri dang me tog sbyin te
T02D1784a:230a-50: bsams la / / yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis
T02D1784a:230b-0: @230b brlabs la sogs kyis gtul bar bya ba dang
T02D1784a:230b-1: bsams la / / / mar mes kyang snang bar byas shing de nyid lha bshos byin te /
T02D1784a:230b-2: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bzlas pa'i so shing dang /
T02D1784a:230b-3: 'thing thung byin la ku sha yang sbyin te /
T02D1784a:230b-4: dbug pa g-yas pa la mdud pa gsum byas pa'i
T02D1784a:230b-5: srung skud bcings shing aom gi shuddha dharmma:sarba p'a pam
T02D1784a:230b-6: ni tsa aa sya sho dha ya /
T02D1784a:230b-7: sarba bi ka w'a na aa pa na ya h'um zhes byas pas dri chu 'thung du bcug la /
T02D1784a:230b-8: ci nus pas zab pa dang rgya che pa'i chos bstan cing /
T02D1784a:230b-9: kye bzhin bzangs rnams song shig / nang par dkyil
T02D1784a:230b-10: 'khor chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i drin gyis mthong
T02D1784a:230b-11: bar gyis shig ces slob ma rnams la smras te
T02D1784a:230b-12: / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod
T02D1784a:230b-13: la nam mkha'i dbyings la bteg cing mnyam par bzhag
T02D1784a:230b-14: pas dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi la nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:230b-15: de nas zhag gnyis pa la lha'i rnal 'byor gyis brlabs la /
T02D1784a:230b-16: bya ba'i sa bon rnams las bskyed pa'i thig skud ni dkar po dang /
T02D1784a:230b-20: aindra n'i la dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D1784a:230b-21: dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur du byas la /
T02D1784a:230b-22: sa bon de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1784a:230b-23: dam tshig las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
T02D1784a:230b-24: de rnams la thim zhing yi ge gsum brjod cing
T02D1784a:230b-25: bsgril ba dag sbyangs te byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D1784a:230b-26: // de'i 'og tu yi ge dza las byung ba'i
T02D1784a:230b-27: zla ba dag nyi ma mig gnyis su bkod cing
T02D1784a:230b-28: // / h'um pra yatstsha pee ro tsa na tsakra
T02D1784a:230b-29: s'u tr'a n'a ya zhes bya bas rang gi mdog
T02D1784a:230b-30: dang 'dra ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying gar
T02D1784a:230b-31: zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i lcags kyu rnams kyi
T02D1784a:230b-32: 'od zer gyi thing skud bkug la thing skud dkar
T02D1784a:230b-34: de bzhin du snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i
T02D1784a:230b-35: snying ga'i zla ba rnams las rang rang gi mdog
T02D1784a:230b-36: dang 'dra ba'i thig skud rnams ji bzhin du thig
T02D1784a:230b-37: skud bzhi la thim zhing sku gsum gyi sgom pas
T02D1784a:230b-38: rang gi sku rdo rjer bsgom zhing /
T02D1784a:230b-39: thig skud 'dzin pa gal te shes rab ma yin
T02D1784a:230b-40: na de'i tshe lha mo spyan du bsgom par bya'o
T02D1784a:230b-41: // gal te slob ma yin na de'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'am /
T02D1784a:230b-42: rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya'o//
T02D1784a:231a-0: @231a * // de bzhin du gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la
T02D1784a:231a-1: rang gi bdag nyid gsung rdo rje dang thugs rdo
T02D1784a:231a-2: rjer bsams la / thig skud 'dzin pa gal te
T02D1784a:231a-3: shes rab ma yin na de'i tshe gos dkar mo
T02D1784a:231a-4: dang m'a ma k'i bsam par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231a-5: gal te slob ma yin na de'i tshe rnam par
T02D1784a:231a-6: snang mdzad dam bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'am rdo rje sems
T02D1784a:231a-7: dpar bsams la / aom dzdza dzdza dzdza zhes bya bas bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:231a-8: nye ba'i sgrub pas kyang aom dzdza dzdza dzdza zhes
T02D1784a:231a-9: bya bas gzung zhing g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis gzung
T02D1784a:231a-10: bas lte ba'i phyogs su thig skud 'dzin par bya'o
T02D1784a:231a-11: // de'i 'og tu mtho ris dang gnod sbyin gyi
T02D1784a:231a-12: bdag po'i phyogs kha bltas pas rdo rje can gyis
T02D1784a:231a-13: nam mkha' la thig skud gdab par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231a-14: de'i 'og tu de bzhin du rang rang gi phyogs la dmigs te /
T02D1784a:231a-15: tshangs pa'i thig skud gnyis sa la btab cing gnod sbyin dang /
T02D1784a:231a-18: klu'i phyogs la kha bltas nas phyi rol du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231a-19: de'i 'og tu me dang bden bral gyi mtshams su kha bltas pas thig gdab par byas te /
T02D1784a:231a-20: shar nub byang dang lho phyogs su //
T02D1784a:231a-21: thig skud bzhi dang dum bu brgyad //
T02D1784a:231a-22: ces bya ba'i rim pas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231a-24: khyed la sems can don dus yin //
T02D1784a:231a-25: zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:231a-26: de la bla ma dang slob ma dag g-yas phyogs nas bskor bas 'gro ba shes par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231a-27: gru bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1784a:231a-28: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste //
T02D1784a:231a-29: dar dbyangs me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1784a:231a-30: gra yi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02D1784a:231a-31: sgro dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02D1784a:231a-32: rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa //
T02D1784a:231a-33: kun du yang ni zlum po'o //
T02D1784a:231a-34: rdo rje ka ba mchog gis spras //
T02D1784a:231a-35: rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1784a:231a-36: hi yig khro bo'i lta ba yis //
T02D1784a:231a-37: de nas sgo ni dbye bar bya //
T02D1784a:231a-38: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad kyi cha //
T02D1784a:231a-39: de yi phyed ni kha khyer ro //
T02D1784a:231a-40: sgo khyud sgo yi tshad ldan pa //
T02D1784a:231a-42: 'gram dang logs ni sgo phyed de //
T02D1784a:231a-43: rdul tsho nas ni de yi phyed //
T02D1784a:231a-44: 'khor lo khru ni bcu drug pa'i //
T02D1784a:231b-0: @231b lha yi snam bu khru gnyis pa'o //
T02D1784a:231b-2: lhag ma rnams ni rtag par 'dod //
T02D1784a:231b-3: de ltar thig btab nas yi ge dza'i 'bar ba'i
T02D1784a:231b-4: lta bas kha dog dkar po la sogs pa'i rdul
T02D1784a:231b-5: tshon rnams byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1784a:231b-6: de rnams la re re ra lha mo bzhis bskor
T02D1784a:231b-7: ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thim zhing yi ge gsum
T02D1784a:231b-9: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya
T02D1784a:231b-10: ba brjod cing rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bla
T02D1784a:231b-11: na med pa'i shes rab kyi dril bu'i sgras mtshan
T02D1784a:231b-12: ma ngan pa la sogs pa sel zhing chos kyi
T02D1784a:231b-13: dbyings kyi rnam dag la dmigs te /
T02D1784a:231b-14: dang po g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi
T02D1784a:231b-15: phyogs nas brtsams te mnyam pa dang mtshungs pa dang
T02D1784a:231b-16: ma chad pas dkar po dang /
T02D1784a:231b-20: nag po'i rim pas rdul tshon rnams dgye bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:231b-21: re re'i rdul tshon gyi ri mo ni sgo'i cha nyi shu'i rags pa bya ste /
T02D1784a:231b-23: 'dri ba'i dkyil 'khor de la shar phyogs kyi sa ni nag po dang /
T02D1784a:231b-24: gshin rje'i sa ni ser po dang /
T02D1784a:231b-25: chu lha'i sa ni dmar po dang //
T02D1784a:231b-26: rnam thos sras kyi sa ni ljang gu dang /
T02D1784a:231b-27: dbus kyi sa ni dkar po'o //
T02D1784a:231b-28: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su gal te bgegs byung
T02D1784a:231b-29: na de'i tshe sngar bshad pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i
T02D1784a:231b-30: sngags h'um dang phat kyi mtha' can gyis de'i rnal
T02D1784a:231b-31: 'byor dang ldan zhing de rnams skrag par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231b-32: yang na don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231b-33: de nas lha bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su padma dang
T02D1784a:231b-34: nyi zla'i gdan rnams ji bzhin du bkod la 'khor
T02D1784a:231b-35: lo la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya'o
T02D1784a:231b-36: // yang na sngar bshad pa'i lha rnams zhal dang
T02D1784a:231b-37: phyag dang mtshon cha dang sku mdog gis mtshan pa
T02D1784a:231b-38: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pa gnas ji lta
T02D1784a:231b-39: ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:231b-40: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor zhugs pa dang byung ba
T02D1784a:231b-41: la sogs pa'i dus thams cad du yi ge gsum
T02D1784a:231b-42: brjod par bya'o // gal te lha'i gzugs bri ba
T02D1784a:231b-43: yin na de'i tshe dbus su rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1784a:231b-44: brjod par bya'o // dang / shar du mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1784a:232a-2: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02D1784a:232a-3: byang du don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1784a:232a-4: dbang ldan gyi mtshams la sogs pa'i grva bzhi po la lha mo spyan dang /
T02D1784a:232a-8: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor la ste shar la sogs
T02D1784a:232a-9: pa'i sgo rnams su gshin rje gshed la sogs pa
T02D1784a:232a-10: dang / grva rnams la mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784a:232a-11: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1784a:232a-12: shar phyogs kyi snam bu nas lho byang gi bar
T02D1784a:232a-13: du byams pa dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa
T02D1784a:232a-14: byang chub sems dpa' gnyi sa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:232a-15: shar dang nub kyi sgo dag la gshin rje mthar
T02D1784a:232a-16: byed dang padma mthar byed kyi cung zad rgyab tu
T02D1784a:232a-17: gnod mdzes rgyal po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur
T02D1784a:232a-18: ba'i rgyal po dag dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:232a-19: reg bya rdo rje ma ni dbus kyi gtso bo dang snyoms par zhugs par dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:232a-20: de rnams kyang sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phyung pa'i snying po rnams kyis bkod la /
T02D1784a:232a-21: nam mkha' la zhugs pa rnams dang dbyer med par byas te /
T02D1784a:232a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bzlas pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa de'i mdun du bzhag cing /
T02D1784a:232a-23: lhag ma lha'i bum pa gzhan rnams kyang rang rang
T02D1784a:232a-24: gi sngags rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor
T02D1784a:232a-25: gyi mtshams la sogs par bzhag cing khro bo gnod
T02D1784a:232a-26: mdzes kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1784a:232a-27: / aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02D1784a:232a-29: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D1784a:232a-30: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat ces bya ba brjod cing /
T02D1784a:232a-31: me tog gi phreng ba blangs te dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing bskor ba gsum byas la /
T02D1784a:232a-32: bcom ldan 'das la phul te dbus su gnas par bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02D1784a:232a-33: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis yid kyis sgo dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:232a-34: de'i dbus su yi ge gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:232a-35: de'i 'og tu bcu drug lo lon pa dang /
T02D1784a:232a-36: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khrus mkhan gyi bu
T02D1784a:232a-37: mo dam tshig gi rigs kyi bdag po'i nga rgyal
T02D1784a:232b-0: dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs @232b te ;
T02D1784a:232b-1: dga' ba'i mthar zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1784a:232b-2: nang du gnas pa'i dam tshig gi 'khor lo phra
T02D1784a:232b-4: sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phyung pa'i snying po rnams brjod cing spro ba dang /
T02D1784a:232b-8: rjes su chags pas thabs dang shes rab kyi bsgom pa'i lha'i 'khor lo bsams te /
T02D1784a:232b-9: yi ge h'um bzhi pa'i sngags dza:'i mtha' can gyis
T02D1784a:232b-10: zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa'i gnod mdzes kyi
T02D1784a:232b-12: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug cing ji bzhin du
T02D1784a:232b-13: rang rang gi gzugs brnyan rnams la phat kyi mtha'
T02D1784a:232b-14: can de'i sngags kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:232b-15: de'i 'og tu snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i
T02D1784a:232b-16: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar spyad pa mtha'
T02D1784a:232b-17: yas pa bza' bar bya ba dang /
T02D1784a:232b-21: ma myos pa'i chang dang ldan pa'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
T02D1784a:232b-24: dga' ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i rol mo la
T02D1784a:232b-25: sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i phyi nang gi mchod pa'i
T02D1784a:232b-27: 'di ni mchod pa dam pa ste//
T02D1784a:232b-28: gang zhig yid ni dga' bar byed //
T02D1784a:232b-29: de phyir kun bdag rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1784a:232b-30: rang rang gzhan rnams mchod par bya //
T02D1784a:232b-32: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1784a:232b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1784a:232b-34: lnga po'i bstod pa gzhan gyis bstod cing bzlas pa'am
T02D1784a:232b-36: zla ba dang nyi ma dang chu dang /
T02D1784a:232b-37: sman dang dri rnams dung chen po'i nang du man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs te /
T02D1784a:232b-38: 'khor lo'i nang du zhugs la de nyid mngon par 'dus byas te /
T02D1784a:232b-39: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas lha dang lha min la
T02D1784a:232b-40: sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin zhing cho ga 'dis
T02D1784a:232b-41: sbyin sreg bya'o // sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer dang ldan zhing khru ni gcig pa ste /
T02D1784a:232b-42: 'og tu khru phyed chad ldan pa //
T02D1784a:232b-43: me thab yongs su zlum po yin //
T02D1784a:232b-44: nang gi cha ni rgya che ba //
T02D1784a:232b-45: sor re dbangs su 'phel bar bya //
T02D1784a:232b-46: rin chen rdo rje mtsho skyes dang //
T02D1784a:232b-47: ral gri yis na kun du bskor //
T02D1784a:233a-0: @233a * // dbus su 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste //
T02D1784a:233a-1: rdo rje la sogs phyogs rnams la'o //
T02D1784a:233a-2: las kun byed pas bzlas pa ni //
T02D1784a:233a-3: mkhas pas byas te yo byad rnams //
T02D1784a:233a-4: g-yon du bzhag ste sreg rdzas rnams //
T02D1784a:233a-5: yang dag bzlas te g-yas su bzhag / mngar ba shing drung bdud shing sogs //
T02D1784a:233a-6: yi ge gsum gyis gsal ba'i me //
T02D1784a:233a-7: rlung g-yab kyis ni sbar byas nas //
T02D1784a:233a-8: g-yas skor bas ni ku sha dgra ma //
T02D1784a:233a-9: de nas snying byung gru gsum ni //
T02D1784a:233a-10: padma la gnas ram las byung //
T02D1784a:233a-11: zhal bzhi pa ni sku mdog ser //
T02D1784a:233a-12: ral pa'i cod pan mchod sbyin dag //
T02D1784a:233a-14: phreng 'dzin zhal dkar me lha bsgom //
T02D1784a:233a-15: ye shes me lha dgug par bya //
T02D1784a:233a-16: bsang gtor la sogs byas nas ni //
T02D1784a:233a-17: de nas mda' rnams gzugs par bya //
T02D1784a:233a-18: rang lha'i sa bon bsams nas ni //
T02D1784a:233a-19: shin tu 'bar ba'i dgang blugs rnams//
T02D1784a:233a-20: de khar re pha bkod nas ni //
T02D1784a:233a-21: de nas yam shing bsreg par bya //
T02D1784a:233a-22: sngags kyis mngon par bzlas pa'i mthar //
T02D1784a:233a-23: 'bar ba'i me la bsreg par bya //
T02D1784a:233a-24: de nas til dang 'bru la sogs //
T02D1784a:233a-25: cho ga 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D1784a:233a-26: de bzhin ye shes me lha yi //
T02D1784a:233a-27: snying ga'i zla bar rang bdag yin //
T02D1784a:233a-28: bsams te de skyed de 'dra ba //
T02D1784a:233a-29: snyoms par zhugs pas rnam par gnas //
T02D1784a:233a-30: zla ba nyi ma la sogs dang //
T02D1784a:233a-31: rdzas gzhan gyis ni me lha mchod //
T02D1784a:233a-32: rim bzhin 'bar ba'i lce ldan pa //
T02D1784a:233a-33: mthar ni dgang blugs bsreg par bya //
T02D1784a:233a-34: zhi ba'i don du rdzas rnams ni //
T02D1784a:233a-35: rang lha sbyor bas bsreg par byas //
T02D1784a:233a-36: yig gsum bdud rtsi sngags kyis ni //
T02D1784a:233a-37: sngags pas bsams te bsreg par bya //
T02D1784a:233a-38: rdzas ni yam shing mar dang ni //
T02D1784a:233a-39: til dang 'bras dang nas rnams ni //
T02D1784a:233a-40: gro dang ma sha 'bras so ba //
T02D1784a:233a-41: spos dang star ga bil ba dang //
T02D1784a:233a-42: gla gor zho sha zho dang ni //
T02D1784a:233a-43: 'o ma d'ur ba ku sha dang //
T02D1784a:233a-44: 'bras bu gsum dang sles tres dang //
T02D1784a:233a-45: kha ra rgyal mo khar lo ma //
T02D1784a:233a-47: pri yang ku dang gur gum dang //
T02D1784a:233a-48: spos gnyis dang ni sman rnams dang //
T02D1784a:233a-49: dz'a ti pha la nor bu dang //
T02D1784a:233b-0: dar dang so rtsi @233b me tog phreng //
T02D1784a:233b-1: de bzhin mchod pa rnams la lnga //
T02D1784a:233b-2: rnal 'byor rgyud la de tsam ni //
T02D1784a:233b-3: go rims kyis ni rdzas rnams so //
T02D1784a:233b-4: rdzas rnams te yi rnam dag pa //
T02D1784a:233b-5: dkyil 'khor rim pas bshad par bya //
T02D1784a:233b-6: ji ltar bla mas slob ma la //
T02D1784a:233b-7: rjes su gzung bas yang dag bya //
T02D1784a:233b-8: yam shing nas ni gro yi bar //
T02D1784a:233b-9: sreg par byed pa de ma thag / mi ga
T02D1784a:233b-10: la sogs pa dbang po drug / tha mal ba
T02D1784a:233b-12: gang zad pas ni sa snying sogs //
T02D1784a:233b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rang nyid //
T02D1784a:233b-14: sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1784a:233b-15: slob ma'i lus la 'jug par bya//
T02D1784a:233b-16: ma sha nas brtsams bu ga'i bar //
T02D1784a:233b-17: bsreg pa de ma thag tu ni //
T02D1784a:233b-18: gzugs la sogs pas don grub po //
T02D1784a:233b-19: rmongs par byed pa dag par 'gyur //
T02D1784a:233b-20: gang zag gzugs gtor la sogs pa //
T02D1784a:233b-21: lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D1784a:233b-22: 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1784a:233b-23: slob ma des na 'jug par bya //
T02D1784a:233b-24: zho nas sle tres kyi ni bar //
T02D1784a:233b-25: bsam gtan rtsol pas bsreg par bya //
T02D1784a:233b-26: rnam shes drug pos 'khor ba yi //
T02D1784a:233b-28: gang zad pas ni ye shes lnga //
T02D1784a:233b-29: ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
T02D1784a:233b-30: rdo rje 'chang chen dang bcas pas //
T02D1784a:233b-31: slob ma de ni rang bzhin byed //
T02D1784a:233b-32: kha ra nas brtsams sman gyi bar //
T02D1784a:233b-33: rtse gcig pa ni bla mas bsreg /'dod chags la sogs so ma nyi pa //
T02D1784a:233b-34: lta ba lnga ni dag par 'gyur //
T02D1784a:233b-35: gang zad pas ni ye shes bcu //
T02D1784a:233b-36: yang na sa ni bcu po ste //
T02D1784a:233b-37: skad cig tsam gyis slob ma yis //
T02D1784a:233b-38: yang dag par ni mngon du gyur //
T02D1784a:233b-39: dz'a ti pha la nas dri'i bar //
T02D1784a:233b-40: rdzas brgyad po ni bsreg par bya //
T02D1784a:233b-42: blo ldan slob ma la ni bya //
T02D1784a:233b-43: gang zad pas ni mngon du ni //
T02D1784a:233b-44: pha rol phyin pa brgyad pa ste //
T02D1784a:233b-45: slob dpon dam pa'i bka' drin gyis //
T02D1784a:233b-46: sgrub pa pos ni tshe 'dir thob //
T02D1784a:233b-47: lha bshos gcig pu bsreg byas na //
T02D1784a:233b-48: nga rgyal rnam par dag par 'gyur //
T02D1784a:233b-49: gang zhig zad ba'i slob ma yis //
T02D1784a:233b-50: pha rol phyin mchog dbu pa thob //
T02D1784a:233b-51: dgang blugs kyi ni sbyor ba dang //
T02D1784a:233b-52: bum pa'i chu yis bsang gtor gyis //
T02D1784a:233b-53: pha rol phyin pa bcu thob pa//
T02D1784a:234a-0: @234a * // blo dang ldan pas slob ma byas //
T02D1784a:234a-1: sbyin sreg las kyi rnam dag pa //
T02D1784a:234a-2: de ni bdag gis yang dag bshad //
T02D1784a:234a-3: rdzas rnams phyi rol kun rdzob kyis //
T02D1784a:234a-4: don dam pa ni rab ston pa'o //
T02D1784a:234a-5: de nas las kun gtor ma ni //
T02D1784a:234a-6: mchog tu grub pa rab ster ba //
T02D1784a:234a-7: khams gsum pa ni tshim pa'i phyir //
T02D1784a:234a-8: blo dag pas ni sngags brjod bya //
T02D1784a:234a-9: lhag ma sreg rdzas bsregs nas ni //
T02D1784a:234a-10: rdor can rang gi rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1784a:234a-11: dkyil 'khor pa ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1784a:234a-12: cho ga 'di ni tshim par bya //
T02D1784a:234a-13: slob ma gzhug pa'i chog bzhin //
T02D1784a:234a-14: rang nyid kyang ni 'jug bya ste //
T02D1784a:234a-15: dbang bskur mthar thug rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1784a:234a-16: rigs bdag pos ni gnang ba thob //
T02D1784a:234a-17: gzhan yang slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir //
T02D1784a:234a-18: de ltar bden pas gsol gdab bya //
T02D1784a:234a-19: chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1784a:234a-20: dang zhing dag pa dri ma med //
T02D1784a:234a-21: gzung ba med cing brjod du mad //
T02D1784a:234a-22: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02D1784a:234a-23: de bzhin de nyid las byung ba //
T02D1784a:234a-24: de rnams bden pas dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1784a:234a-25: dri med pa yi slob ma kun //
T02D1784a:234a-26: gzugs brnyan ltar snang mthong bar shog / nam mkha' bskyed pa'i mtshan ma can //
T02D1784a:234a-27: thog mtha' med pa'i gtso bo ste //
T02D1784a:234a-28: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D1784a:234a-29: rdor sems de dang bdag grub shog / thams cad mchog ni dngos grub che //
T02D1784a:234a-30: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1784a:234a-31: rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal po ni //
T02D1784a:234a-32: mi 'gyur dam pa bdag grub shog / khyod ni 'jig pa skyon med pa //
T02D1784a:234a-33: chags pa kun gyis rjes chags te //
T02D1784a:234a-34: bcom ldan chags chen dga' ba che //
T02D1784a:234a-35: yang dag tu ni bdag grub shog / shin tu dag pa chos mchog ni //
T02D1784a:234a-36: thog ma nas dag de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1784a:234a-37: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1784a:234a-38: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub shog / thams cad mchog ni dngos grub che //
T02D1784a:234a-39: phyag rgya mchog gis dbang bskur che //
T02D1784a:234a-40: rdo rje sgeg gdab rdo rje che //
T02D1784a:234a-41: 'gying ba rdo rje bdag grub shog / sems can kun la yid khyab pa //
T02D1784a:234a-42: sems can kun gyi yab gyur cing //
T02D1784a:234b-0: dam tshig mchog ldan 'dod pa mchog / bden pa @234b gang gis dam tshig che //
T02D1784a:234b-1: thabs dang shes rab bdag dkyil 'khor //
T02D1784a:234b-2: bdag po 'dis ni mgon po bdag /'dod pa khyod kyis rdzogs par mdzod //
T02D1784a:234b-3: de ltar dam tshig gi glu yis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:234b-4: de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga 'di yin te /
T02D1784a:234b-5: ji ltar bshad pa'i tsho gas slob ma mngon par 'dus byas la /
T02D1784a:234b-6: sdom pa blangs pa de'i snying gar snyoms par zhugs pas bde ba chen po bsams te /
T02D1784a:234b-7: de'i sbyor ba'i bskyod pa las byung ba 'od zer
T02D1784a:234b-8: gyi phreng ba can lus kun snang bar byed pa'i
T02D1784a:234b-10: gos dmar po thogs pa dang /
T02D1784a:234b-11: ras dmar pos mig g-yogs pa /
T02D1784a:234b-12: aa kham b'i ra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
T02D1784a:234b-13: thal mos me tog phreng ba blangs pa mgo ru
T02D1784a:234b-14: bzhag cing gsol ba gdab pa la 'jug go //
T02D1784a:234b-15: bde ba la dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dris pa dang /
T02D1784a:234b-16: kye ba de nga chen po nga ni skal pa
T02D1784a:234b-17: dang ldan pa yin no zhes zhu ba brjod par
T02D1784a:234b-18: bya'o // de nas yi ge lnga pas zhugs shing 'di ltar smra par bya ste /
T02D1784a:234b-19: khyod ni de ring de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams
T02D1784a:234b-20: cad la zhugs pas de bas na bdag gis khyod
T02D1784a:234b-21: la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1784a:234b-22: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thob na /
T02D1784a:234b-23: dngos grub gzhan dag smos ci dgos /
T02D1784a:234b-24: dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du khyod kyis kyang smra bar mi bya ste /
T02D1784a:234b-25: dka' ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung nga re /
T02D1784a:234b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D1784a:234b-27: snying la yang dag gnas pa ste //
T02D1784a:234b-28: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1784a:234b-29: de ma thag tu gas nas 'byung //
T02D1784a:234b-31: ga pur dang ni tsandan bcas //
T02D1784a:234b-32: rdo rje yang ni mngon bzlas te //
T02D1784a:234b-33: dung phor las ni bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1784a:234b-34: de nas de ni 'thung du gzhug / gsum dang yi ge lnga sngags kyis //
T02D1784a:234b-35: blo brtan slong mi byas nas ni //
T02D1784a:234b-36: 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te //
T02D1784a:234b-37: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1784a:234b-38: dam tshig bsrung pas dngos grub ster //
T02D1784a:234b-39: bdud rtsi lnga chu btung bar gyis //
T02D1784a:234b-41: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi lag na rdo rje bdag yin pas /
T02D1784a:235a-0: bdag gis 'di gyis shig ces ji @235a ltar smra pa de khyod kyis bya'o //
T02D1784a:235a-1: khyod kyis kyang bdag la smod par mi bya ste /
T02D1784a:235a-2: gzhan du na dka' ba ma spangs par dus byas la dmyal par lhung par gyur ta te /
T02D1784a:235a-3: de nas slob ma la bsnyen par byas te /
T02D1784a:235a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig pa dang /
T02D1784a:235a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par mdzod cig / ces smra ba 'jug go //
T02D1784a:235a-6: di nas le'u bco lnga las gsungs pa'i cho gas dbab la /
T02D1784a:235a-7: dbab pa de yang tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02D1784a:235a-8: sha shva to me bha ba /
T02D1784a:235a-9: hri da yam me aa dhi tishsha sarba sidhhim me pra ya tstsha /
T02D1784a:235a-11: zhes brjod pas brtan par byas te /
T02D1784a:235a-12: yi ge lnga pas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor la
T02D1784a:235a-13: gtor du 'jud cing de nyid kyis kyang blangs te
T02D1784a:235a-14: de nyid kyis spyi bor bcings la /
T02D1784a:235a-15: snying ga'i zla bar bdag po dang /
T02D1784a:235a-17: dpral bar ram bsams te yi ge lnga pas mig
T02D1784a:235a-18: phye zhing man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil
T02D1784a:235a-19: 'khor ston cing / kye rdo rje ltos shig ces smra bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:235a-20: mi mnyam med pas gru bzhi pa //
T02D1784a:235a-21: dran pa'i dang po sgo bzhi yin //
T02D1784a:235a-22: bsam gtan bzhi po rta babs ldan //
T02D1784a:235a-23: kha khyer ting nge 'dzin du bshad //
T02D1784a:235a-24: kha khyer la gnas rdo rje mchog / gzugs ni lha mo dang ldan pa//
T02D1784a:235a-25: rgyan ni sna tshogs thams cad ldan //
T02D1784a:235a-26: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
T02D1784a:235a-27: kun gyi rtse mo ba dan dang //
T02D1784a:235a-28: dril bu sgra sgrogs gdul bya ston //
T02D1784a:235a-29: ye shes me long me tog dang //
T02D1784a:235a-30: byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02D1784a:235a-31: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / zla ba nyi mas kun du bskor //
T02D1784a:235a-32: kun gyi dngos grub mi 'gyur pa de //
T02D1784a:235a-33: bde ba chen po zhes bstan to //
T02D1784a:235a-34: de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni //
T02D1784a:235a-35: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1784a:235a-36: de ni rnams par thar pa brgyad //
T02D1784a:235a-37: dngos grub thams cad bde ster ba //
T02D1784a:235a-38: rdo rje tshig gis yongs su bskor ba //
T02D1784a:235a-39: thams cad du ni yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1784a:235a-40: de la zhugs pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1784a:235a-41: zil gyis mi gnon phyir mi ldog / bde ba chen po rab grub phyir //
T02D1784a:235a-43: de nas rdo rje slob dpon la //
T02D1784a:235a-44: yon ni shin tu mchog pu la nas //
T02D1784a:235b-0: dbang bskur @235b don du gsol gdab bya //
T02D1784a:235b-1: 'gro ba skyob phyir rdor can gyis //
T02D1784a:235b-2: sangs rgyas rnams la dbang bskur ni //
T02D1784a:235b-3: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar gsol //
T02D1784a:235b-4: de bzhin deng bdag la stsol mdzod //
T02D1784a:235b-5: zhugs pa'i sgo yi mngon phyogs su //
T02D1784a:235b-7: rang bdag sbyor ldan slob ma ni //
T02D1784a:235b-8: sna tshogs gdan khri la bzhag nas //
T02D1784a:235b-9: lus la dkyil 'khor bkod nas ni //
T02D1784a:235b-10: cho ga 'dis ni dbang bskur bya //
T02D1784a:235b-11: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang //
T02D1784a:235b-12: bum pa rol mo gos bzangs dang //
T02D1784a:235b-13: lha yi rgyan ni thogs pa ste //
T02D1784a:235b-14: snga ma'i thugs rje'i shugs kyis ni //
T02D1784a:235b-15: chags pa dgug cing kun byung ba /
T02D1784a:235b-16: dbang gi dus su slob dpon gyis //
T02D1784a:235b-17: mkha' dbyings sems can thams cad kyis //
T02D1784a:235b-18: yongs su gang bar bsgom par bya //
T02D1784a:235b-19: bum pa'i chu la thim byas nas //
T02D1784a:235b-20: bdag po bdud rtsi ldar bzhugs pa //
T02D1784a:235b-21: mgrin par gos bzangs bcings pa na //
T02D1784a:235b-22: spyan la sogs pas de gzung zhing //
T02D1784a:235b-23: bum pas ba spu'i bu gnas //
T02D1784a:235b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad zhugs par bya //
T02D1784a:235b-25: tshigs bcad sngags 'di brjod bzhin pas //
T02D1784a:235b-26: slob pa'i lus la dbang bskur bya //
T02D1784a:235b-27: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje chos //
T02D1784a:235b-28: khams gsum bas ni phyag byas pa //
T02D1784a:235b-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum ;
T02D1784a:235b-30: / gnas las byung ba bdag gis sbyin //
T02D1784a:235b-32: dad pa'i blos ni ji bzhin du //
T02D1784a:235b-33: cod pan gyis kyang dbang bskur bya //
T02D1784a:235b-34: sbyor ba yis ni brtan byas te //
T02D1784a:235b-35: rim pas ji ltar phyag mtshan bzhin //
T02D1784a:235b-37: sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni //
T02D1784a:235b-38: de ring khyod ni dbang bskur ba //
T02D1784a:235b-39: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1784a:235b-40: dngos grub phyir ni rdo rje long //
T02D1784a:235b-41: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stv'am /
T02D1784a:235b-42: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1784a:235b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1784a:235b-44: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1784a:235b-45: rdo rje 'gying ba bdag po'i bdag /
T02D1784a:235b-47: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1784a:235b-48: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D1784a:235b-49: rgyal pas byang chub mchog 'dod pa //
T02D1784a:235b-50: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1784a:235b-52: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa //
T02D1784a:235b-53: ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D1784a:236a-1: bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D1784a:236a-2: srid pa dam par byed pa'o //
T02D1784a:236a-4: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D1784a:236a-5: sdug bsngal chen po tshogs yin te //
T02D1784a:236a-6: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D1784a:236a-7: dam tshig 'di nang de skyid pa'o //
T02D1784a:236a-8: 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod ni //
T02D1784a:236a-9: ci bde bas ni bsten par bya //
T02D1784a:236a-10: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1784a:236a-11: rang dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D1784a:236a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mchog / ji srid 'khor ba la gnas pa //
T02D1784a:236a-13: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D1784a:236a-14: byed du nus te 'tshang me rgya //
T02D1784a:236a-15: shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang //
T02D1784a:236a-16: bsod nams byin rlabs las byung ba //
T02D1784a:236a-17: dngos grub kun ni dbang phyug 'grub //
T02D1784a:236a-18: sems can don ni brtan par byed //
T02D1784a:236a-19: sngags kyi sku ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D1784a:236a-20: sku kun rab tu brtan pa ni //
T02D1784a:236a-21: des na phyag rgya rab tu grags //
T02D1784a:236a-22: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02D1784a:236a-23: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje blang ;
T02D1784a:236a-24: / chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D1784a:236a-25: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya che //
T02D1784a:236a-26: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02D1784a:236a-27: zhes bya ba gang gsungs pa de so sor bstan to //
T02D1784a:236a-28: aom badzra aa dh'i pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a m'a bhi she ka ta /
T02D1784a:236a-29: kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba dpal gyi sgra brjod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:236a-31: sku gsum sa la sogs pa dang //
T02D1784a:236a-32: stobs dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02D1784a:236a-33: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1784a:236a-34: lag na rdo rje phyag na gnas //
T02D1784a:236a-35: lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D1784a:236a-36: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1784a:236a-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma
T02D1784a:236a-38: ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra y'a mi hi
T02D1784a:236a-39: hi hi hi h'um zhes bya bas ni rdo rje
T02D1784a:236a-41: sdig med slob ma dam pa ni //
T02D1784a:236a-42: me tog sogs kyis mchod par bya //
T02D1784a:236a-44: de nas de la dbang bskur byin //
T02D1784a:236a-45: m'a ma k'i sogs dang sbyar nas //
T02D1784a:236a-46: bdag ni skal ldan zhes brjod nas //
T02D1784a:236a-47: rdo rje padma dag bsdus te //
T02D1784a:236a-48: de bde la ni snyoms zhugs na //
T02D1784a:236a-49: rdo rje padma las dgug cing //
T02D1784a:236a-50: slob ma'i mkhar ni mkhas pas bcug / kye ma bde ba zhes brjod pas //
T02D1784a:236a-51: sems byung ba ni myang bar bya //
T02D1784a:236a-52: mi mkhas pa yi slob ma la //
T02D1784a:236a-53: de nyid 'di ni bstan par bya //
T02D1784a:236b-0: dbang bskur ba tsam @236b 'di nyid kyis //
T02D1784a:236b-3: bde bas slob dpon nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1784a:236b-5: shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i dang por dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1784a:236b-6: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //
T02D1784a:236b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang /
T02D1784a:236b-8: kha na ma tho ba sbam po bcu ste /
T02D1784a:236b-9: de rnams slob ma nyan du gzhug ba dang /
T02D1784a:236b-11: gdol pa dang khrus mkhan dang gar mkhan ma rnams
T02D1784a:236b-12: las gang yang rung pa'i phyag rgya ma rigs lngas
T02D1784a:236b-14: rdo rje slob dpon gyis mtshan phyed la slob ma de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1784a:236b-15: de'i tshe phyag rgya mas slob ma la 'di skad smra ba ste /
T02D1784a:236b-16: bshang gci dang ni khrag dang ni //
T02D1784a:236b-17: shu kra de bzhin sha nyid dang //
T02D1784a:236b-18: bha ga'i padmar tsum ba na //
T02D1784a:236b-19: bud med rnams la dad pa'i mchog / khyod kyis rdor can ci nus sam //
T02D1784a:236b-20: bde chen bu ni smra bar gyis /
T02D1784a:236b-21: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1784a:236b-22: bzhad cing 'di ltar bka' stsal te //
T02D1784a:236b-23: shu kra khrag la sogs za ba //
T02D1784a:236b-24: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus //
T02D1784a:236b-25: bha ga'i tsum ba na dang ni //
T02D1784a:236b-26: rtag tu bud med la dad bya //
T02D1784a:236b-28: na bza' phud cing nyid kyi padma yang dag par bstan pa ste /
T02D1784a:236b-30: bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa //
T02D1784a:236b-31: cho ga gang gis sten byed na //
T02D1784a:236b-32: de yi mdun du bdag gnas pa'o //
T02D1784a:236b-33: sems can khams ni rab grol ba //
T02D1784a:236b-34: chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa 'di //
T02D1784a:236b-35: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1784a:236b-36: 'di la bde chen rgyal po gnas //
T02D1784a:236b-37: de na de'i nang du gnas pa'i //
T02D1784a:236b-38: rtsa yi 'khor lo bstan pa yin //
T02D1784a:236b-39: bha ga'i dbus su nam mkha' gang //
T02D1784a:236b-40: nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste //
T02D1784a:236b-41: ze ba ge sar dang ldan pa //
T02D1784a:236b-42: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1784a:236b-43: shu kra'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi ni //
T02D1784a:236b-44: de la gnas pa rtag tu 'dzag /
T02D1784a:236b-45: de nas slob ma bka' stsal te //
T02D1784a:236b-46: bhanydza mo ksha ho zhes bya'o //
T02D1784a:236b-48: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02D1784a:236b-49: bha ga'i dbus su rtsa gang gnas //
T02D1784a:236b-50: sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa gzhan rnams //
T02D1784a:236b-51: de yi nang na de gtso bo //
T02D1784a:236b-52: goms dang bla ma'i zhal nas ni //
T02D1784a:237a-2: cung zad sor mos bskul ba dang //
T02D1784a:237a-3: slar yang lce yi rtse mos bskul //
T02D1784a:237a-4: dkar mchog rab tu rgyu ba ni //
T02D1784a:237a-5: de nas rtsa de kha phyed gyur //
T02D1784a:237a-6: pha rol phyin pa bcu stobs nas //
T02D1784a:237a-7: de bzhin stobs dang dbang nyid bcu //
T02D1784a:237a-8: sa ni bcu la 'das nas ni //
T02D1784a:237a-9: de nas rdo rje rengs par gyur //
T02D1784a:237a-10: de nyid kyi phyir le'u bco brgyad pa las kyang /
T02D1784a:237a-11: bsgrub bya sgrub byed sbyor ba ni //
T02D1784a:237a-12: gang phyir bsnyen pa bshad pa dang //
T02D1784a:237a-13: rdo rje padma sbyor bas ni //
T02D1784a:237a-14: nye bar bsgrub par 'dod pa yin //
T02D1784a:237a-15: h'um dang phat gnyis ldan pa ni //
T02D1784a:237a-16: bskyod pa sgrub par rab bshad pa'o //
T02D1784a:237a-17: rang ngo rang bde bzhi pa ni //
T02D1784a:237a-18: sgrub pa chen por bshad pa yin //
T02D1784a:237a-19: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang chen gyi go 'phang //
T02D1784a:237a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs 'byung ba //
T02D1784a:237a-21: de ni chos rnams chos nyid do //
T02D1784a:237a-24: de nas lha mo des rengs pa rdo rje'i steng du bzhugs la bsgrub pa bya'o //
T02D1784a:237a-25: slob mas kyang aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta a'a
T02D1784a:237a-26: nu ra ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko&
T02D1784a:237a-27: ham zhes bya ba la brjod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:237a-28: de nas slob dpon gyis kyang rdo rje dpang phyug
T02D1784a:237a-29: ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i slob ma gzigs te
T02D1784a:237a-30: rang gi thugs ka nas mo ha ra ti la
T02D1784a:237a-31: sogs pa lha mo bzhi po slob ma'i snying gar
T02D1784a:237a-32: zhugs par bya'o // mkha' dbyings rdo rje spyor ba yis //
T02D1784a:237a-33: yang dag rig pas rmad byung che //
T02D1784a:237a-34: mchog tu dga' ba skyed byed pa'i //
T02D1784a:237a-35: gang zhig bde ba de skye 'gyur //
T02D1784a:237a-36: bral dang dga' ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D1784a:237a-37: mtshon cha bltas nas brtan par gyis //
T02D1784a:237a-39: rdo rje nor bu'i lte ba dag / btsir bas rdo rje skyil krung gis //
T02D1784a:237a-40: nor bu'i nang 'gro'i sems blta bya //
T02D1784a:237a-41: gang zhig ye shes skye 'gyur te //
T02D1784a:237a-42: ye shes de ngo smra mi nus //
T02D1784a:237a-43: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1784a:237a-44: bar pa yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02D1784a:237a-45: gang tsho ye shes lta ba yis //
T02D1784a:237a-46: rnal 'byor pa yis skad cig gam //
T02D1784a:237a-47: yang na thun gcig gam bdun nam //
T02D1784a:237a-48: zla phyed zla gcig lo gcig gam //
T02D1784a:237a-49: bskal pa bskal pa stong gi phrag / ye shes sbyor bas gnas 'gyur ro //
T02D1784a:237b-0: de nas ci nus pas slob ma phyung zhing rig ma'i padmar gnas @237b pa'i byang chub kyi sems /
T02D1784a:237b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kyi blos lce bskul bas btung bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:237b-2: de'i dus su yang lha mo de la bhanydza mo
T02D1784a:237b-3: ksha ho zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bka' stsal pa
T02D1784a:237b-4: yin te / shes rab dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1784a:237b-5: de nas don dam pa'i yum dang chos kyi sku
T02D1784a:237b-6: skyed par byed pa'i rig ma'i brtul zhugs kyi ngo
T02D1784a:237b-7: bo tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bskul zhing /
T02D1784a:237b-8: slob ma'i lag tu de gtad nas //
T02D1784a:237b-9: bla ma rdo rje can gyis smra //
T02D1784a:237b-10: thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya //
T02D1784a:237b-11: de phyir rig ma'i phyogs zung shig / chos kun gnyis su med pa ste ;
T02D1784a:237b-12: / tshul ni gnyis kyis brtan pa yin //
T02D1784a:237b-14: khyod kyis bral bar mi bya'o //
T02D1784a:237b-15: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1784a:237b-16: rig ma'i brtul zhugs bla med pa //
T02D1784a:237b-17: rmongs pa gang ges 'da' byed pa //
T02D1784a:237b-18: mchog gi dngos grub des mi 'thob //
T02D1784a:237b-19: ces bya ba sa phyag rgya ma des slob ma de la gtan du sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1784a:237b-21: snying dang spyi por sangs rgyas dgod //
T02D1784a:237b-22: h'um yig mchog gi tshul brjod rnams //
T02D1784a:237b-23: sangs rgyas kun gyis de bsten pa'i //
T02D1784a:237b-24: dam tshig de ni nyan 'jug bya //
T02D1784a:237b-25: thabs dang shes rab bsam pa yis //
T02D1784a:237b-26: cung zad mi byar med pa ste //
T02D1784a:237b-27: rtag tu rtog pa med 'gyur zhing //
T02D1784a:237b-28: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod cig / ji bzhin rang bzhin nyid kyis ni //
T02D1784a:237b-30: 'dod chags la sogs rnam dag pas //
T02D1784a:237b-31: de bzhin sems can gyi don bya //
T02D1784a:237b-32: chags pa mnyam pa med pa ste //
T02D1784a:237b-33: rgyal ba rnams la de dbul bya //
T02D1784a:237b-34: sems can don phyir gzhan bud med //
T02D1784a:237b-35: bsten na bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
T02D1784a:237b-36: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1784a:237b-37: sangs rgyas sku yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1784a:237b-38: gzhan gyi nor rnams 'phrog byed na //
T02D1784a:237b-39: sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1784a:237b-40: gang zhig dam tshig la sdang dang //
T02D1784a:237b-41: gang zhig skye bo dam tshig nyams //
T02D1784a:237b-42: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyu yis ni //
T02D1784a:237b-43: rtsol bas de rnams gsad par bya //
T02D1784a:237b-44: gdon mi ja yi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1784a:237b-45: brdzun dag rdo rje tshig rnams ni //
T02D1784a:237b-46: rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D1784a:238a-1: pas dam tshig mchog bsten bya //
T02D1784a:238a-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gyur cing
T02D1784a:238a-3: gzengs bstod kyis g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos
T02D1784a:238a-4: kyi dbus nas gzung ba dang /
T02D1784a:238a-5: g-yas pas kyang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya byas la lung bstan par bya ste /
T02D1784a:238a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs ;
T02D1784a:238a-7: / bdag gis khyod la lung bstan bya //
T02D1784a:238a-8: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton zhing //
T02D1784a:238a-9: yang dag srid pa sgrub phyir ro //
T02D1784a:238a-10: kye yi rdo rje che ge mo //
T02D1784a:238a-11: zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gang la gzengs
T02D1784a:238a-12: bstod pa 'di yis lung bstan par byas pa de
T02D1784a:238a-13: ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1784a:238a-14: byad chub la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T02D1784a:238a-15: slob dpon nyid du lung bstan pa ste /
T02D1784a:238a-17: de nas dbugs dbyung bar byas la /
T02D1784a:238a-18: sngags dang bsam gtan byin par bya'o //
T02D1784a:238a-19: de la sngags ni yi ge gsum gyis spel ba'i
T02D1784a:238a-20: dzin dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1784a:238a-21: / sv'a h'a'i mtha' can gyi bzlas pa'i sngags rnams so //
T02D1784a:238a-22: de'i mos pa'i dbye bas snga ma bzhin lha'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan no //
T02D1784a:238a-23: de nas slob ma mchod pa rnam pa lngas dkyil
T02D1784a:238a-24: 'khor mchod du bcug la rang gis kyang mchod cing
T02D1784a:238a-25: gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pas rgyal po bzhi'i gtor
T02D1784a:238a-26: ma dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma dang /
T02D1784a:238a-28: de nas zhi ba'i don du snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg kyang bya'o //
T02D1784a:238a-29: de nas slob ma gdugs dang bcas pa mthe po
T02D1784a:238a-30: g-yas pa la gzung zhing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba
T02D1784a:238a-31: gsum byed du bcug cing gdugs dang bcas pa de
T02D1784a:238a-32: nyid dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo la dbul
T02D1784a:238a-33: bar bya ste / slob ma 'di ni dad pa yis //
T02D1784a:238a-34: dam tshig dkyil 'khor la phul te //
T02D1784a:238a-35: mgon po de ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1784a:238a-36: rjes su brtse bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D1784a:238a-38: de nas yi ge mu'i mtha' can gyi yi ge
T02D1784a:238a-39: brgya pas gshegs su gsol zhing dkyil 'khor gyi rdul
T02D1784a:238a-40: tshon bsdus te gtsang po la gtor ro //
T02D1784a:238a-41: phur bu rnams kyang bton te'o mas bkrus shing spos kyis gdugs la /
T02D1784a:238a-42: me tog spyin zhing gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1784a:238a-43: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi yang ba chus byugs la /
T02D1784a:238a-44: me tog gis dgram par bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-0: 'phags pa brgyad stong pa kla gcing [*klag cing?] bsod nams @238b bsngo ba dang /
T02D1784a:238b-3: bskor ba byas nas bzod par gsol zhing langs te
T02D1784a:238b-4: rang gi gnas su phyin nas mnyam par gzhag par
T02D1784a:238b-5: bya zhing yid la byed pa de nyid kyis spyod
T02D1784a:238b-6: lam bzhi pos ci 'dod pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-7: des ni cho ga'i sgras ni bstan pa yin te /
T02D1784a:238b-8: dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784a:238b-9: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1784a:238b-10: dkyil 'khor de la phyag rgya ni 'khor lo la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784a:238b-11: rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1784a:238b-13: de rnams bsam pa ji bzhin bya ba ni bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-14: sngags ni sgrub pa po rnams kyis gsang ba mchog de ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02D1784a:238b-15: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas //
T02D1784a:238b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su de'i sa bon nam /
T02D1784a:238b-18: phyag mtshan nam sku bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-19: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang //
T02D1784a:238b-20: zhes pa ni shar la sogs pa phyogs bzhi la de rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-21: sku gsung thugs rdo rje mchog ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:238b-22: de rnams grva rnams su bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-23: khro bo rnams ni sgo rnams dang de'i grva rnams dang /
T02D1784a:238b-25: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:238b-26: sngags zhes pa ni rnal 'byor bas de nas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-28: gsang ba dang rdo rje ni gsang ba rdo rje ste /
T02D1784a:238b-30: de dag gis rab bsgoms pa ni khrus mkhan ma dang snyoms par zhugs par bya'o zhes ston to //
T02D1784a:238b-31: sngags rnams thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D1784a:238b-32: dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi dam tshig ni mchod pa
T02D1784a:238b-33: ste / 'da' dka' ba ni spang bar mi bya'o zhes ston to //
T02D1784a:238b-34: bshang dang gci bzhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:238b-35: dkyil 'khor de nyid du ba shang gci la sogs
T02D1784a:238b-36: pa'i bdud rtsi rnams rnal 'byor ba nyid kyis spyod
T02D1784a:238b-37: pa dang / slob ma rnams la yang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1784a:238b-38: sngags rnams thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du rnam
T02D1784a:238b-39: par snang mdzad kyi rigs can gyi dam tshig 'di
T02D1784a:238b-40: yin te bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag
T02D1784a:238b-41: go // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de
T02D1784a:238b-42: rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ni rnam par snang
T02D1784a:238b-43: go // mdzad de / de'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1784a:239a-2: gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig ni padma'i rigs can rnams te /
T02D1784a:239a-3: de dag gi sprin ni tshogs te /
T02D1784a:239a-4: de nyid bkod pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag pa ste /
T02D1784a:239a-5: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D1784a:239a-6: gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
T02D1784a:239a-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1784a:239a-8: khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya //
T02D1784a:239a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:239a-10: khru nyi shu'i tshad ni phyogs re re khru lnga lnga yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:239a-11: 'dir yang sgra rlung lnga'i bdag nyid yin pa dang /
T02D1784a:239a-12: de nyid gsang ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D1784a:239a-13: la zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes rnam par dag pa'o
T02D1784a:239a-14: // de bzhin du snga ma bzhin du gru bzhi
T02D1784a:239a-15: pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de
T02D1784a:239a-16: nyid rdo rje sgom pa ni brtan pa'i ting nge
T02D1784a:239a-17: 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyis bri
T02D1784a:239a-18: // bar bya'o // nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1784a:239a-19: de'i gnas ni de dang dbyer med par bya'o //
T02D1784a:239a-20: sku'i rdo rje ni snyid ga'i padma ste /
T02D1784a:239a-21: de'i yon tan ni phreng ba yin la /
T02D1784a:239a-22: de skyed pa ni de 'dzin pa ste padma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'o zhes ston to //
T02D1784a:239a-23: rgyal po chen po rdo rje chos //
T02D1784a:239a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:239a-25: dkyil 'khor de nyid du rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D1784a:239a-26: rgyal po chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D1784a:239a-27: rig pa ni lha mo rnams dang /
T02D1784a:239a-28: dbang po ni khor bo dang /
T02D1784a:239a-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02D1784a:239a-30: de dag dbab par bya ba ni bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:239a-31: de'i dbus su 'khor lo chen po ni 'khor lo'i
T02D1784a:239a-32: tshul gyis zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams dang
T02D1784a:239a-33: / kun du zlum po ni sna tshogs padma rnams kyang bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:239a-34: phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1784a:239a-35: cad kyi phyag mtshan phyag rgya la sogs pa bri
T02D1784a:239a-36: bar bya'o // ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1784a:239a-37: cho ga bzhin du zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las 'byung ba'i rim pas so //
T02D1784a:239a-38: tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che //
T02D1784a:239a-39: zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi dbus
T02D1784a:239a-40: su snang ba mtha' yas kyi phyag mtshan gyi phyag
T02D1784a:239a-41: rgya las gang yang rung ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:239a-42: snang ba mtha' yas de nyid kyi gang zhig rdo rje'i gnas ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
T02D1784a:239b-0: de rnams thams @239b cad snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D1784a:239b-1: yongs su gsal ba dang cho ga bzhin du rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D1784a:239b-2: de'i dbus su gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba ni
T02D1784a:239b-3: shin tu bslabs pa dang 'dus byas pa'i gar mkhan
T02D1784a:239b-4: gyi bu mo dang snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
T02D1784a:239b-5: de ltar byas na rdo rje can ni gsung rdo rje'i rigs can rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784a:239b-6: de bzhin du bshang ba la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lngas mchod par byas na /
T02D1784a:239b-7: dngos grub ni gsung rdo rje 'dzin gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784a:239b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad ni gsung rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02D1784a:239b-9: de dag gi dam tshig mchod pa ste /
T02D1784a:239b-10: 'da' dka' ba ni spang bar mi bya'o zhes ston to //
T02D1784a:239b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gsung gi snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02D1784a:239b-12: de'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes nye bar bsdu ba ste /
T02D1784a:239b-13: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
T02D1784a:239b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:239b-15: kun nas spri na ni rin chen dpal la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:239b-16: de rnams kyi tshogs ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
T02D1784a:239b-17: de rnams bkod pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa ste /
T02D1784a:239b-18: de nyid rdo rje 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D1784a:239b-19: rab tu gsang ba ni bya ba'i tshul la gnas pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ba dang /
T02D1784a:239b-20: gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bor gyur pa sa de'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784a:239b-21: dkyil 'khor ni rin chen dpal la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dag ste /
T02D1784a:239b-22: de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1784a:239b-23: rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa ;
T02D1784a:239b-24: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:239b-25: re zhig thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gsum bstan pa yin la /
T02D1784a:239b-26: de'i nang na rdo rje 'dzin mchog ni rin chen
T02D1784a:239b-27: 'byung ldan dang don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1784a:239b-28: sgom pa la sogs pa byed na /
T02D1784a:239b-29: de'i tshe de nyid kyi gzugs sam phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgyal sogs pa bri ba'o //
T02D1784a:239b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor de shes par bya'o //
T02D1784a:239b-32: sku gsung thugs ni rigs gsum ste /
T02D1784a:239b-33: de rnams kyi gsang ba bsdu ba ste /
T02D1784a:239b-34: de las byung ba ni rin chen la sogs pa'i rigs rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:240a-2: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rigs gsum gyi sku gsung thugs rnams yin la /
T02D1784a:240a-3: gsang ba ni bsdu pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784a:240a-4: nyid kyi sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni dkyil
T02D1784a:240a-5: 'khor pa rnams kyi gang zhig gnas ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1784a:240a-6: te / de nyid kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag ste /
T02D1784a:240a-7: de'i gsang ba ni de'i bdag po nyid da /
T02D1784a:240a-8: de'i dngos grub ster ba'o zhes pa bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784a:240a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:240a-10: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1784a:240a-11: de rnams 'byung ba ni gang las skyes pa de
T02D1784a:240a-12: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
