T02D1784a:279b-41: de la zhugs pas na bcom ldan 'das te de la bstod pa'o //
T02D1784a:279b-42: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1784a:280a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni btsun mo'i bha ga @280a * //
T02D1784a:280a-1: la bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784a:280a-2: de rnams kyi bdag po ro gcig pa nyid du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1784a:280a-3: de bzhin du rdo rje ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1784a:280a-4: de 'dzin pa ni de'i ngo bos bzhus pas na rdo rje 'dzin no /
T02D1784a:280a-5: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das la dga' bas bstod
T02D1784a:280a-6: pa ni sems can thams cad don mdzad pa la
T02D1784a:280a-7: rjes su chags pas bskul pa ste /
T02D1784a:280a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal pa mchog go //
T02D1784a:280a-9: sems can khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D1784a:280a-10: khyod ces pa ni yid kyis brtags nas bod pa
T02D1784a:280a-11: ste / thams cad du de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1784a:280a-12: rdo rje ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02D1784a:280a-13: de thugs gang la yod de rdo rje thugs so /
T02D1784a:280a-14: gnas ni sa'i khams te de'i dbang phyug ni de rnams par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784a:280a-15: de bzhin du sems can gyi khams kyi dbang phyug kyang yin te zhi par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:280a-16: bdag ni lha mo spyan la skyabs su gsol pa ni srung par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02D1784a:280a-18: dga' ba ni sems can gyi khams la brten te byams pas bsdus pa ste /
T02D1784a:280a-19: sgyur pa de nyid kyis gang zhig don chen ni byang chub thob par byed pa dang /
T02D1784a:280a-20: yid 'ong ni bde ba ster par ba ste /
T02D1784a:280a-21: 'dod pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lha nye par
T02D1784a:280a-22: spyod pa ste sems can gyi khams la gsol pa'i
T02D1784a:280a-24: de bzhin du bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol
T02D1784a:280a-25: pa ni bdag byams pa rdzogs pa mdzod cig pa'o
T02D1784a:280a-26: // sems can yab ni skyed par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1784a:280a-27: chen po byang chub thob par mdzad pa'i phyir sems
T02D1784a:280a-28: can de nyid kyi gnyen mchog ni phan mdzad pa'o
T02D1784a:280a-29: // gal te bdag gson par bzhed na de'i tshe

T02D1784a:280a-37: rdo rje sku khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa

T02D1784a:280a-39: sku thob pas rdo rje sku'o //
T02D1784a:280a-40: sems can kun ni khams gsum pa ste /
T02D1784a:280a-41: de la thugs rjes yang dag par sdud par mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02D1784a:280b-0: sems @280b can kun la phan no //
T02D1784a:280b-1: bka'i 'khor los 'gro pa'i bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir bka' 'khor lo'o //
T02D1784a:280b-2: sangs rgyas don du byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid de /

T02D1784a:280b-5: can rnams la gang gis rab tu ston par mdzad

T02D1784a:280b-8: rje dam tshig chags pa ni 'dod chags rnam par

T02D1784a:280b-12: dag pa'am // mdzod cig pa'o ; / mgon po
T02D1784a:280b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no
T02D1784a:280b-14: dag pa'am // mdzod cig pa'o ; / de nas
T02D1784a:280b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig rten dbang
T02D1784a:280b-16: phyug ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02D1784a:280b-17: de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje can ni gos dkar mos te /
T02D1784a:280b-18: de pas 'dod pa la nye par longs spyod pa'i
T02D1784a:280b-19: dam tshig phul du byung pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i
T02D1784a:280b-20: gtso bor gyur pa'i tshig gis bstod pa ni bskul
T02D1784a:280b-21: pa'o // khyod ni rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba
T02D1784a:280b-22: la sogs pa la yan lag dgug pa'i chos ston
T02D1784a:280b-23: pa'i phyir rdo rje gsung ngo //
T02D1784a:280b-24: kun ni 'gro pa kun la dga' bas phan zhing thugs brtse pa'o //
T02D1784a:280b-25: de bzhin du 'dod chags ye shes kyis 'dod chags
T02D1784a:280b-26: nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyang pas rtag tu ni
T02D1784a:280b-27: dus gsum du 'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don
T02D1784a:280b-28: ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can gyi khams
T02D1784a:280b-31: bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes pa ni dgongs shing snyoms par zhugs par mdzod cig pa'o //

T02D1784a:280b-34: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no /
T02D1784a:280b-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D1784a:280b-36: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dam
T02D1784a:280b-37: tshig rdo rje don yod grub pa ste /
T02D1784a:280b-38: de nyid kyi btsun mo ni btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin gyi lha mo sgrol ma ste /
T02D1784a:280b-39: des yid bde pa'i dga' pa'i thugs dang gsung dang sku dgyes par byed pa'i tshig gam /
T02D1784a:280b-40: bde pa dang yid dga' ba ni btang snyoms kyis stong pa ni bskul pa'o //
T02D1784a:281a-1: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:281a-2: rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1784a:281a-3: de nyid 'dod pa ni btang snyoms kyi tshangs pa'i
T02D1784a:281a-4: gnas kyis mngon du mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dod
T02D1784a:281a-5: pa'o // dam tshig ni las thams cad de de
T02D1784a:281a-6: rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro
T02D1784a:281a-7: pa'o // // che ba ni sems can gyi khams
T02D1784a:281a-8: te de'i phrag dog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir don
T02D1784a:281a-9: pa'o // // che ba'o // bya ba nan tan
T02D1784a:281a-10: grub pa'i ye shes kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1784a:281a-11: sangs rgyas kyi rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D1784a:281a-12: la mchog ni mdzes par gyur pa'o //

T02D1784a:281a-18: dang rin chen mang po ni smin pa dang grol

T02D1784a:281a-21: bdag la brten nas 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1784a:281a-22: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /

T02D1784a:281a-27: pas de'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo bzhis bskul ba

T02D1784a:281a-29: / 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la cig car du bzhengs nas /
T02D1784a:281a-30: 'dod chags thams cad ni aa lingga na la sogs pa ste /

T02D1784a:281a-33: des dpal ni rang dang gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs
T02D1784a:281a-34: pa ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la
T02D1784a:281a-35: snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1784a:281a-36: kyi btsun mo ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa

T02D1784a:281a-38: ni aa lingga na la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis 'dod
T02D1784a:281a-39: chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags
T02D1784a:281a-40: bar ma'i rim pas bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid
T02D1784a:281a-41: nye bar mtshon cing nor bu'i nang du 'gro ba
T02D1784a:281b-0: de nyid brtan par mdzad @281b nas de nyid ro
T02D1784a:281b-2: 'dod pa spyod pa ni nyams su myong zhing cang
T02D1784a:281b-3: mi gsung bar gyur pa ni de la rtsol ba
T02D1784a:281b-4: mi ldan par gyur pa ste /
T02D1784a:281b-5: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
T02D1784a:281b-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod
T02D1784a:281b-7: chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la bcom ldan 'das
T02D1784a:281b-8: bzhugs pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni ji srid
T02D1784a:281b-9: khams gsum pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten te /

T02D1784a:281b-11: na la sogs pa la 'byung ba'i dga' ba las

T02D1784a:281b-13: ba'i rang bzhin gyi thugs rtse gcig par gyur pas

T02D1784a:281b-26: 'dzin gyis 'gro ba dang de bzhin du dbyer med

T02D1784a:281b-30: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de dang 'dra ba'i ting
T02D1784a:281b-31: nge 'dzin ston par mdzad pa yin te /

T02D1784a:281b-37: ni bde ba chen po'i sku kho bos ro gcig

T02D1784a:281b-43: rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa ste /

T02D1784a:282a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni khyod de /

T02D1784a:282a-7: ba ste / to // de nas zhes bya ba

T02D1784a:282a-9: sogs pa chos 'byung la zhugs pa de rnams nyid

T02D1784a:282a-14: bya rdo rje ma'i bha ga las byung zhing bcom
T02D1784a:282a-15: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

T02D1784a:282a-19: ni rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par gyur pa de

T02D1784a:282a-23: gyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa'i phyir de nyid
T02D1784a:282a-24: the tshom med pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste /

T02D1784a:282a-27: 'dod chags kyi spyod pas byang chub rjes su rtogs
T02D1784a:282a-28: pa yin no zhes de skad ma zer cig /'dod

T02D1784a:282a-33: dam tshig dang mtshungs pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra

T02D1784a:282b-32: dgongs shing cang mi gsung bar gyur to //

T02D1784a:282b-38: kye sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams de
T02D1784a:282b-39: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ni
T02D1784a:282b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs
T02D1784a:282b-41: pa'i de kho na nyid thob par byed pa'i dpal
T02D1784a:282b-42: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud gzhung dang don gyi bsgom
T02D1784a:282b-43: pa ni 'dzin pa dang grags par gyis shig pa'o
T02D1784a:282b-44: // gang gi phyir sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas sems
T02D1784a:282b-45: can rnams skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir yin no
T02D1784a:282b-46: // // de ltar spyi'i gtad pa mdzad nas gang
T02D1784a:282b-47: gi lag tu rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di shin tu
T02D1784a:282b-49: gang zhig dbang po rno ba yin pa'i phyir grags
T02D1784a:282b-50: par byed nus pa'i rdo rje chos de la rdo
T02D1784a:283a-2: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:283a-3: kye phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1784a:283a-4: cad kyi dam tshig sku la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D1784a:283a-5: rnams dang / de kho na nyid de don dam pa ste /
T02D1784a:283a-6: de ltar rim pa gnyis gtso bor gyur ba'i rgyud
T02D1784a:283a-7: 'di khyod kyis zung shig ces pa ni gzhung dang
T02D1784a:283a-8: don gyis gzung bar gyis shig pa dang /
T02D1784a:283a-9: ji bzhin skal ba dang ldan ba rnams la bstan par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1784a:283a-10: khyod kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:283a-11: de ring nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1784a:283a-12: cad kyis dbang bskur ba yin no zhes gsung gis
T02D1784a:283a-13: dbang bskur ba gsol zhing glegs bam gtang ba yin
T02D1784a:283a-14: no // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1784a:283a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chos kyis bdag la
T02D1784a:283a-16: rjes su gzung ba dam pa yin no zhes yid
T02D1784a:283a-17: kyis bsam zhing cang mi smra bar gyur te /
T02D1784a:283a-18: de khas blangs ba'i phyir dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784a:283a-19: de'i phyir phyag na rdo rje ni rgyud thams cad kyi sdud ba po yin no ;
T02D1784a:283a-20: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtad
T02D1784a:283a-21: pa yongs su rdzogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1784a:283a-22: cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum ni bcom
T02D1784a:283a-23: ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la zhugs par
T02D1784a:283a-24: gyur ro // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:283a-25: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784a:283a-26: pa thams cad kyi sku'i mnyam pa nyid ni sku
T02D1784a:283a-27: dang dbyer med ba nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1784a:283a-28: dmigs te khams gsum thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gnas
T02D1784a:283a-29: ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1784a:283a-30: de las sku'i rang bzhin du zhugs par gyur ro //
T02D1784a:283a-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D1784a:283a-32: bzhin du gsung rdo rje dang thugs rdo rje dag
T02D1784a:283a-33: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
T02D1784a:283a-34: thugs kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1784a:283a-35: dmigs nas / snga ma bzhin du rdo rje 'chang
T02D1784a:283a-36: chen po'i gsung dang thugs dag la de'i bdag nyid
T02D1784a:283a-38: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:283a-39: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1784a:283a-40: cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni khams gsum pa thams
T02D1784a:283a-41: cad dang dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D1784a:283a-42: ting nge 'dzin la dmigs nas de'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1784a:283a-43: kyis cang mi smra bar gyur pa ni 'od gsal
T02D1784a:283a-44: ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas chu bo'i rgyun rgyu
T02D1784a:283a-45: ba bzhin du de nyid la dgong sa shing bzhugs
T02D1784a:283a-46: bar gyur te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784a:283b-0: 'di @283b skad ces bka' stsal to zhes pa ni
T02D1784a:283b-1: tshig gi don bcu drug gis bshad pa gtso bor
T02D1784a:283b-2: gyur pa bsdus pas na rim pa 'dis ston par
T02D1784a:283b-3: byed pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud de bzhin
T02D1784a:283b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang
T02D1784a:283b-6: du ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi khams rjes su
T02D1784a:283b-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1784a:283b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa drug pas de skad ces bka'
T02D1784a:283b-10: stsal to zhes sdud pa po ste tshig gi don
T02D1784a:283b-11: bcu drug go // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784a:283b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas te /
T02D1784a:283b-13: de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni rim pa gnyis kyis sgrub pa ste /
T02D1784a:283b-14: de gtso bor gyur pa gang zhig gsang ba 'dus pa zhes pa la /
T02D1784a:283b-15: gsang ba ni bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ba dang /
T02D1784a:283b-16: 'dus pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1784a:283b-17: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud las de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784a:283b-18: pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1784a:283b-19: pa ste / de rnams kyi gang zhig bsrung bar
T02D1784a:283b-20: bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig dang
T02D1784a:283b-21: pa ste / sdom pa ste / de rnams nyid spang bar mi bya ba'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02D1784a:283b-22: de'i byin gyis rlob pa ni mngon du byed pa ste /
T02D1784a:283b-23: de nyid kyi rgyal po ni thams cad las phul du byung ba ste /
T02D1784a:283b-24: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni de
T02D1784a:283b-25: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom
T02D1784a:283b-26: pa rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes
T02D1784a:283b-27: bya ba'o // le'u zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa
T02D1784a:283b-28: dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag
T02D1784a:283b-29: chags rnams 'don par byed pa dang /
T02D1784a:283b-30: rdo rje 'chang nyid ster bar byed pas na le'u ste sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784a:283b-31: rgyud 'grel las le'u bcu bdun pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
T02D1784a:283b-32: le'u bcu bdun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni bdun brgya brgyad cu'o //
T02D1784a:283b-33: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyud 'grel zhes bya ba la /
T02D1784a:283b-34: rdo rje theg pa chen po pa slob dpon chen
T02D1784a:283b-35: po dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad
T02D1784a:283b-37: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i t'a ra ka
T02D1784a:283b-38: la sha'i sras pandi ta ku m'a ra ka la
T02D1784a:283b-39: sha'i dpon po mantra ka la sha zhes bya ba
